sections.title: Become a deco partner
sections.subtitle: Build and monetize AI agents and workflows â€“ join deco's partner program and ship fast.
sections.trustSignalTitle: Who's already building with deco CMS

topBenefits.title: Close deals faster
topBenefits.description: Leverage deco to go from prompt to production seamlessly

topBenefits.title: Monetize your way
topBenefits.description: Commission, revenue sharing and marketplace in one billing system

bottomBenefits.title: Grow with us
bottomBenefits.description: listed as partner, co-marketing events, backlog priority

bottomBenefits.title: Empower your team
bottomBenefits.description: free workshops, certifications and job listing

partnerTypes.title: Agentic Agencies
partnerTypes.description: you build and deliver agentic software (AI Agents, Workflows, Views)

partnerTypes.title: ISVs
partnerTypes.description: you want to monetize useful software on top of deco (MCPs, AI Apps, etc)

partnerTypes.title: Technology Partners
partnerTypes.description: you have independent software that integrates with deco (Cloud, Observability, etc)

requirements.text: At least 2 developers with valid certifications at https://deco.camp
Publish 1 AI App or Custom MCP Server
Developer activity in the last 30 days on our main open-source repository

sections.subtitle: highlights
sections.title: What you get

highlights.title: Partner listing
highlights.description: Be found on our partner finder page, ranked by results

highlights.title: Certifications
highlights.description: Agentic Engineers L1 and more @ deco.camp

highlights.title: Leads and co-marketing
highlights.description: Referred directly by deco team & 50/50 co-marketing

sections.targetTimeNote: Ship your first AI project in 7 days

sections.subtitle: How to get started
sections.title: How the program works

steps.title: Apply
steps.description: sign up and tell us about your previous experience and partnership type

steps.title: Get certified
steps.description: certify your team at deco.camp, claim your credits and deliver your first solution

steps.title: Scale up
steps.description: register deals, request co-marketing and publish case studies.

sections.tipText: Not sure if you fit the program? Schedule a 20 min call

processSteps.description: If approved: sandbox access + Starter Kit + certification invite.
If waitlisted: suggested steps for qualification (e.g., blueprint completion, cohort date).

faqItems.question: Do you provide customer leads?
faqItems.answer: Yes, for certified and listed partners, based on your tier and availability

faqItems.question: Can we resell deco?
faqItems.answer: Yes, there are multiple ways to do this. From a simple affiliate partnership to building white label solutions on top of deco infrastructure.

faqItems.question: How do deal conflicts work?
faqItems.answer: Registered deals have a 60-day protection window.

faqItems.question: How do certifications work?
faqItems.answer: There are monthly opportunities to certify your team at https://deco.camp

faqItems.question: Where can we see pricing?
faqItems.answer: deco CMS has usage-based pricing at https://decocms.com/pricing

value.title: Summarized Terms (summary)

terms.title: Referral payments
terms.description: within 30 days after Deco receives first payment; 12-month cap unless reseller.

terms.title: Reseller
terms.description: bills end customer; Deco bills partner; service/support split: L1 (partner) / L2+ (Deco).

terms.title: IP:
terms.description: pre-existing stays with owner; new code defaults Apache-2.0 (or agreed license).

terms.title: Brand use:
terms.description: follow Deco brand guide; badges by tier/certification.

value.footerNote: Full legal documentation available during onboarding.

sections.title: Ready to build together?
sections.subtitle: Start your application now or schedule time for a quick intro.

seo.title: Become a deco partner | Build and Sell Agentic Software
seo.description: Join the deco partner program and build AI-native experiences with our open-source runtime and Context CMS. Get sandbox credits, leads, certifications and co-marketing opportunities.
